column3: Nihinona odhivela mwaha wa ela : Yesu Kirixtu ohupeleka egumi yaaye wa hiyo . Mowindo enofuneya nipelekege dhigumi dheehu wa amudhi eehu mwa Kirixtu .

Othabela wa Paxkwa ogali vakukuuve , Yesu aganonile wi mudhidhi waaye wahifiya woovenyamo mwiilaboni mu , adhowe wa Baabi vowi ahaadhivela ale yaali aaye mwiilaboni mu , owaadhivela ofiyedha omakuthulo .
Mwa yaaka makumi mannayi Mulugu aaludduwele aani ? Aaludduwele ale yathegile , ekwela mwiiddeddereni miruthu dheewa dhikala mwemo .
Wona ahima owiiwelela , kamwihiye dhigumi dheenyu ojiwa ni dhikwaminigwa dhanniinyuna mugali moohunonelamo .
Mulugu ahawiira athu aatene wona anyakaambura a ohiiwelela wi aweeddiwele thagaraga aatene .

Gahiiwa nakalahi ndhu vaari va dheegumi nnayi nde , niiraga : « Kilu emohi ya tirigu mutheengoya boolivelana nlabo nimohi na mabasa . Kilu thaaru dha sevada mutheengoya booligana . Mbwenye kamunoonge makura naari vinyu » .
Mwiiyevihe vameentoni va Nabwiya , vano oliye onowuwunnuwihani .
mwaha wi ahithoma nlabo nimohi nneeriiye athonge elabo yaatene ni oharihamo odheela mwa muthu mmohi omusakuliiye , vano ola aheehiwa vameentoni va aatene , voomvenyiha muukwani » .
Vano anyakoddo yahiluwaga kara ya miinga , omuwariha mmuruni mwaaye . Yahimuwarihaga yoowara ya roxa ombeddaga .
Mowindala ginowuulaga wi ahiyana amaamukwele a yaaka vang'ono eteliwege , yaabalege ahima , yeeddihege pama mirala dheewa wi amwiiddani eehu nihaavahe mwaha wonaabana .
Muroromele wi miyo ginakala mwa Baabi teto Baabi onakala mwa miyo . Mwaanganyedhaga , roromelani mwaha wa mabasa eneereya .
Okwa ni mburo wa anookwa dhahivokedhiwa munyaza ya munddo . Nyaza ya munddo ela fu okwa wa nabiili .

Dhahaakale ndo , eere orabula dila dhijinjidhene wambeela omapadduwelo wa elabo . Mbwenye dhiinova , omagomelo wa mudhidhi , oliye okumelele dila emohi baahi wi avenyihevo dhoothega dhaatedhene odheela mwa mukutho waaye-waaye .
Mwa yaaka makumi mannayi ahivilela ni aliwa mwiiddeddereni .
Mowindo , addibilaga , arogoraga , mwaatugumana wi muje , mujejihanege kadda muthu ni mukwaaye .

Vakakaruliiye selu ya neetanu ni emohi gahisugwa , keeng'anani , wahikala othikeya wuulubale , nduwa nahisadduwa okala nooriba wona dhoowara dha omaamukwele , vano mweeri wahisadduwa okala woofiila wona mwazi ,
ahiyana yahawaakela anookwa eewa oovenyihiwa muukwani . Amohi yahirabulihiwa , okoodda wooboliwa wi yaande ofwanya ovenyihiwa wa egumi yookwaranya .

Pawulo ahaakulaga , wiira : « Eganiwaxulile vaari va athu , hiyo nigali anamurala a omwene wa aRoma teto onivokedha mukaambura nihithongiwe , vano enafuna enikumihe mowiipiteya ? Ii , naari . Kadhikale ndo ! Edhe aliweene enitapule » .

Vowi Malamulo eneera : « Kuraruwe , kupe , kawiiye , kukalele nrima » , malamulo ala ni mamohi maatene enamorela munlamuloni ndda , nneera : « Waadhivelege amwaaddamani wona muneedhiveliiwe wamwiinya » .
Vano ole winna ojejiha wula mwa Kirixtu , onowiyeeliha mmurimani wona Kirixtu oli oweela murima .
Murima waaga onohagalala ni Malamulo a Mulugu ,
Muhagalalegeve mwa Nabwiya ! Ginowelela : Agalalani !
Gahirugunuwaga wi gimoone awoga ni miyo aali aani . Ngarugunuwile gahoona extanti tanu ni biili dha oro , vaheliwa panti .
Aalibelele aani wi kidha evolowa mburo waaye woovuma ? Aalibelele ale yaali oohiiwelela .
Aatene yadhiile miyo gihinadhe , ambava , anamapa , mabilaya kayawiiwelele .
Nyoovo amwiimeleli , mwawiiwelelege anabwiya eenyu ni nriiho naatenene , muhawiiwelelege apamave ni oopwaasa , mbwenye teto mwawiiwelelege ni alene eli oorusa .
Yahiveleela onamoona wooratha , yoowogaga , yiiraga : « Mulobwana ola kanahiya owoga dhoonyemula mburo woweela ola teto ononyemula Malamulo .
Dhaatedhene ndo dhinadha wa Mulugu , oyene onandanihe ni oliye odheela mwa Kirixtu teto ohunivaha mabasa owawaandaniha athu ni Mulugu .
Amudhaaga , muubuwelelege mukalelo wa anamavuhulela ewogile mu ndina na Nabwiya , ehirabulana dhabure ni ovilela , mwaahadhihege aliweene .
Vano aatene ayene eneethane ndina na Nabwiya eneere ovulumusiwa › .
yiiraga : « Ameni ! Mareeliho , nthithimiho , tthottho , otthettheela , oriiha , owodha ni kopolo sa Mulugu eehu okala ni okala . Ameni ! »
Oriya weenyu ohukale wowiiwomihedha odeve wona mathithi owaaluwa ni birinku dha oro , naari guwo dhooterenya .

Mowindo kukalena manyazo omwiirela onamoona Nabwiya eehu , naari okalana manyazo wa miyo , munyakaambura aaye , moohiyaniha , we orabule vamohi ni miyo mwaha wa Muselu Wapama , nneere ovilela odheela owodha wa Mulugu .
Mwaha wa aliwa ginowiipeleka wa nyo wi aliwa teto epelekiwe wa nyo mwa ebaribari » .
Mwiing'anele , mulibihe dhego dhihalile dhihinakwe , goonile wi mabasa eenyu kahuwo owaakwana mmoobuweloni a Mulugu aaga .
Mungero a neethaaru ahikuthulela pusulano naaye mmihinjeni ni mmaneedduudduni , mahinjeya osadduwa mwazi .
Oliye dinifugulele dila wi voororomela naakele mahala Mulugu enanivahiiye , mukaraatiliihu dhiinova . Mowindo nnogayela moojejiha nthithimiho na Mulugu .
Munone wi anamararuwa , naari owiirana dhootakala , naari a osilila , kinaakele mareeliho a Omwene wa Kirixtu ni wa Mulugu . ( Osilila weebedha dhooreela , eli wona waweebedha amilugu eebeweene . )
Mwa nroromelo Abarahamu , ahiiwelela veethaniwiiye wi adhowe elabo yaavahiwiiye wona mareeliho yaroromelihiwiiye , ahimaruwaga odhowaga ahinonile wadhowigiiye .
Kamulezelege , olezela ononoonga egumi ya muthu , moohiyaniha , mudhaaliwe ni Muneba Woweela .
Athu ajinji eneerege ohara dhowiira dheewa dhabure , mwaha wa aliwa athu ajinji eneerege onyemula dila ya ebaribari .
Mwa oliye , hiyo ni nyo , nihikanna waanda ofiya wa Babiihu , mwa Muneba mmohive .

Mbwenye nihaalebela kaarata wa athu emuroromele Yesu ehili aZhudewu wi ehijege nyama ya aneenyama ookutheliwa a milugu eebeweene , ehijege mwazi , naari mwaneenyama oohogiwa wi ehikale ajeberuwe , anamararuwa » .

Mbwenye Peduru ahimukohaga , wiira : « We Ananiya , orumeedhele ddi wi murima waawo odhaaliwe ni Sathana , ofiyedha onyengetha Muneba Woweela ologoha korowa dhimohi dha mudda waawo wi dhikale dhaawo ?
Nihikale ahima , nihithukuleliwege wula ni wula ni kuluzi , pevo yaatene ya masuuziho ooratha kinaanithukule . Ela enatapulela wi athu oowaraala ni ooratha kinaande oninyengetha ni masuuziho eewa .

Nyo kamunonile wi athu ohogoowa kidha evolowa muuMweneni wa Mulugu ? Kamwiinyengethe ; ooraruwa , naari owaweebedha amilugu oosemiwa , naari ajeberuwe , naari alobwana ni ekalelo ya ehiyana , ahiyana oorarusana ahiyanave , naari alobwana oorarusana alobwanave ,
Kanihiye otugumana weehu wona athu amohi eneeriiwa , mbwenye nilibihanege kadda muthu ni mukwaaye , tthabwa-tthabwa dhiinova vinooniinyu wi nlabo nnowaaddamela .
Ndala mpe dhifunelo dheenyu dha elabo ela : Oraruwa , ogaya , ojeberuwe , dhifunelo dhabure , ojeya mirima ni dhaatedhene , dhili wona waweebedha amilugu eebeweene ,
Hiyo nili a mutana , mowindo niyiing'anelege , niware nroromelo ni odhivela wona dhowiithiithihedhana teto niware ojejiha ovulumusiwa wona kapaseti .
Vowi Muneba onivahile Mulugu kunadhiiha woova , mbwenye onavaha kopolo , odhivela ni owaraala .
Ole oneera : « Gihimunona Mulugu » , vano ahimwiiwelelaga di namaratha , ebaribari kili mwa oliye .
akwanelihani ohagalala waaga mwiiragana nda : Dhoofuna dheenyu dhikale dhimohive , mudhivelanege mmohi ni mukwaaye , mukale amohive mmirimani mweenyu teto moobuwelo eenyu .
Vevale athu yoofunaga omwihidda Yesu , mbwenye kaalivo mmohi amukahinyilege , mwaha wi mudhidhi waaye waaligi ohunafiye .
Waalamulege wi yiiregena dhapama wi ekalege ooreela mwa meerelo apama , oofeewa mada , oodhiveliwa ogawana ni oohukanna .
Yahimwaakulaga , wiira : « Aheere ahiiragana yootakala , kanamudhana wa nyo » .

Oyene onalogolela nlabo nangana , oneera ndo wi amuriihe Nabwiya . Ole onaja eli yaatene , oneera ndo wi amuriihe Nabwiya , vowi onamutthettheela Mulugu mwaha wa yooja eyo . Ole ohunaja dhaatedhene teto oneera wi amuriihe Nabwiya , oliye onamutthettheela Mulugu .
Muhagalalege ni ojejihedha weenyu . Mvilelege vaari va orabula , mulobelege mudhidhi dhaatedhene .
Vevale ahimulamulaga sinturiyawu wi amwiing'anelege Pawulo , mbwenye amvahege otapuwa omohi , aahiyege akwaaye edheege omukamihedha .
Odhivela onokuneela dhaatedhene , onororomela dhaatedhene , onojejiha dhaatedhene , onovilelana dhaatedhene .
Maleba Ootaleleya yiire : « Gihiroromela , mwahaya buuyene giwogeliimi » . Hiyo ninna mukalelo mmohive woororomela , mwahaya buuyene onawogeliihu ,
Amudhi eehu , nnowuuwaraalihani mwaasumululege ale ehinalaba , mwaalibihege aliba wukuuwa , mwaakamihedhege amangoonya , mvilelege ni aatene .
Mungero a neetanu ahikuthulela pusulano naaye vampanddoni va mwaneenyama , omwene waaye wahisadduwa okala epipi . Athu yooluma malumi eewa mwaha woovoreya .
Aatene eneedda mwa mukalelo ola , murenddele ni thagaraga dhikale ni aliwa ni aEzarayeli a Mulugu .
Oliye ahisuuzihiwa dila ya Nabwiya ; teto owaaguva mmunebani owoga ni osuuziha dha Yesu ni ononelamo , mbwenye anonile obathizo wa Zhuwawu baahi .
Mowindo , mwaajaga , naari mung'waga , naari mwiiragana yego si yego , mwiiregena dhaatedhene wi Mulugu athithimihiwege .

Okuthuleliwa waakeliliinyu wa oliye onakalave mwa nyo . Ndala kamunarabulelege osuuzihiwa , mbwenye okuthulela waaye onowusuuzihani dhaatedhene . Yosuuziha ela si ya ebaribari , kahuwo oratha . Mukaleve mwa oliye wona musuuzihiweliinyu .
Wona mwiili wahikanna muneba ohukwa teto nroromelo nahikanna meerelo nihikwa .
Agawogile ndo ahithukulaga mukaathe , omutamaalela Mulugu vameentoni va athu aatene , oliye ogwaddanya , wambeela oja .
mbwenye naalebele kaarata enawoga dhowi ehijege dhooja dhooveleeliwa mukutho wa amilugu oosemiwa , kayiiregena dhooraruwa , kijege nyama dhoothithikuliwa naari mwazi .
Vano Pawulo ahiwogaga ni oliye , wiira : « Mulugu onowuuddwadha , we nsiri noweelihiwa ! We kukaraatile wi ogithonge moohara Malamulo ? Mbwenye we kunahariha Malamuloya , onalamula wi giddwadhiwe » .
Mowindo dhiinova kudha okala okoniwa wa athu eli mwa Yesu Kirixtu .
Mwaha wi Mulugu kaniithanele okoniwa , mbwenye wi naakele ovulumusiwa odheela wa Nabwiya eehu Yesu Kirixtu ,
Onokuma anyengethege dhilabo magomelo mannayi a elabo , Gogi ni Magogi . Oneere waanyengetha wi dhilabo dhitugumane ewane koddo . Wiinjiva weewa onakale wona museenga wa munyaza .
Ebaribareene amohi mwa nyo mwaali ndo , mbwenye muhuhabihiwa , weelihiwa , wiiriwa owogoowa mwa ndina na Nabwiya Yesu Kirixtu , mwa Muneba wa Mulugu eehu .

Mwaha woolaleya waaga ginoorabula mukaambura mu , mbwenye miyo kaginakanna manyazo , vowi gihimunona oyene ginamuroromeliimi vano ginororomela wi oliye onowaanda okameela yoologolela yaaga , ofiyedha nlabo nddo .
Mwiiregena dhaatedhene dhedho mulobaga okamihedhiwa ni Mulugu , mulobelege mwa Muneba . Muwaraale . Kamugome . Mulobelelegeve mulogo waatene wa Mulugu .

Wa athu a gerezha ya oTesalonika , ayene eli muumohini ni Mulugu Baba ni Nabwiya Yesu Kirixtu . Di miyo Pawulo , vamohi ni Silivano , Timoteyo nnaleba kaarata ela . Mulugu oovaheni mahala ni murenddele mmirimani mweenyu .
Ofwaaseya weenyu ononeye ni aatene . Nabwiya eehu oli vakukuuve .
Vowi mudhidhi dhaatedhene munajigiinyu mukaathe ola , naari vinamung'wigiinyu nakoma ola , munalaleyege okwa wa Nabwiya ofiyedha odha waaye .
Nlobelo neeriwana ni nroromelo mureddaya onoyila ; Nabwiya onomvenyiha . Akala ohuthega , onoleveleliwa .
Ginomutthettheela Mulugu , oyene ginamulabiimi ni murima woweela wona mweerela makolo aaga , ginowuwuubuwelela weevo mmalobeloni mwaaga mutana ni mahiyu .
Wiithanaga mwaango ni mabwe , yiiraga : « Munimorele hiyo , munilogohe wi ahinoone ole okaraatile vampanddoni ni wa owali wa Nibila ,

Ole winna obaruni eewege nde Muneba Woweela dhinawogiiwa wa magerezha . Wa ole onaagonjihe ginomvaha manaa oologohiwa . Teto ginomvaha nibwe noweela , vinaalebiwe ndina nixa nihinaanoneye ni muthu bure ahili ole waakelile › .
Mwaha woojiwa mirima ni korowa , aliwa eneerege wuunyengethani ni thalako dhineerigiisuna . Mbwenye aliwa boothongiweene , muliba waabwanyula oli owiimeleene .
Mwaha wowi ehikoodda ebaribari , Mulugu onowaarumihedha kopolo dhowaaviriganiha wi erumeedhege dhooratha ,
Eli wona munawogela Maleba , yiiraga : « Athu oode enomunyemula Mulugu mwaha wa nyo aZhudewu » .

Alobwana eneerana dhedhi eli wona Zhanesi ni Zhambere ayene wale yamwiinyuwele Mozezi , dhiinova teto anamasuuziha ooratha ala enowiinyuwela ebaribari . Mirima dheewa dhihipahuwa , vano yahixixa ohara nroromelo , mbwenye yahilepela .
Aatene ayene ginaadhiveliimi ginowaaruniha ni waasumulula . Vano mukale a nthakwithakwi , mutthwaruwe .
Vowi odheela mwa nroromelo nnowiiriwa owogoowa ni Mulugu , nihikanna murenddele ni Mulugu odheela mwa Yesu Kirixtu Nabwiya eehu .
Wiing'anelege okala wa egumi yaawo osasanyedhaga dhinasuuzihiiwe . Odidele dhedho . Weeragana dhedho onowiivulumusa weevo , vamohi ni ayene enoovuruwana .
Dila dhijinji mu nyuba dha matugumano dhaatedhene gowaarabuliha , gooxixa wawiiriha wi emunyemulege Yesu . Mwaha wa owali waaga goovenya waaharaharaga aliwa naari mmaluwani oode .
Dhowiira dha omuthu dhili dhoononeya : Oraruwa , moobuwelelo ootakala , ojeberuwe ,
Mowindo ole onadhala kahuwo yego , naari ole onahela mahinje , mbwenye oofuneya di Mulugu ononnuwiha .
Mowindo kavili mvahi wa Muneba Woweela wuuhaleeleni vinajejihiinyu odha wa Nabwiya eehu Yesu Kirixtu wi avuhuleliwe .
Gihiiwa oruma odhulu warumaga wona mahinje a vapalani wona oruma wa dari elubale . Oruma giiwiliimi waali wona wa anamooba baangwe yamoobaga baangwe eewa .
Wa oliye anamavuhulela aatene enomwiirela onamoona wi odheela mwa ndina naaye aatene enamuroromela enoleveleliwa dhoothega dheewa » .
Wa ale enavilela mowiirana opama , enosayela nthithimiho , nriiho ni egumi yoohuvudda , Mulugu onoodha aavahe egumi yoohumala .

Miyo Zhuwawu dilebele gerezha tanu nabiili dhili elabo ya oAziya . Mahala ni murenddele wa nyoovo odheela wa ole oli , aali , onaadhe , teto odheela wa mineba mitanu ni miinddi dhili vameentoni vaaye ,
Vevale Pawulo ahiwogaga , wiira : « Zhuwawu aabathiza ale yatthwaruwe mwa dhoothega dheewa . Owawaaddela wi emuroromele ole aadheege , oliye amuwogaga Yesu » .
Dhaatedhene nda dhinooniha wi Nabwiya ohunona waavulumusa ale eneehiwa enamwiiwelela teto ohunona waalogolela oohogoowa ofiyedha Nlabo na Othongi ,
Ohiya nda , aliwa yoojejiha elabo yookwaranya , ela sowi elabo enadha odhulu . Mwahaya buuyene Mulugu kanakalana manyazo wiithaniwa Mulugu eewa , mwaha wa ela , oliye ohaasasanyedha nluwa .
Thalako dheebeweene , dhoomunyemula Mulugu orabelege . Wiilibihe ni olemeelela omuriiha Mulugu .
Aliwa yaheddeedda elabo yaatene , waapeelela mburo wa misasa dha oweela mirima ni nluwa nnamudhivela . Mbwenye munddo wahidha odhulu waapaha ale .
Ahilamula wi ebathiziwe mu ndina na Yesu Kirixtu . Nuwindo , yahimuloba wi akale ni aliwa malabo vang'ono .
Onororomela wi oli musogoleli a athu oohoona , panti yowaamoneya athu eli muyiihini ,
Yoororomeliha eniireliiye si egumi yoohumala .

Tthottho dhinadha odhulu vowambeela sapama , kadhinna yoohaleela . Athu yinna tthottho nda enakala a murenddele , oofwaasa , owiiwanana , oodhaaliwa thagaraga , ni meerelo apama , kinakanna nsakulo , kahuwo ooratha .
Baabi onomudhivela Mwaanaye teto ahihela dhaatedhene mmadani mwaaye .

Nabwiya kanaribeliwiha wiirana eroromelihiiye wona munoobuwelela amohi yoonaga oribeliwa . Moohiyaniha , oliye wiire okala oovilela ni nyoovo , afunaga wi ahikalevo onaatolosiwe , mbwenye aatene etthwaruwe .
Geere odhiveliwa athu aatene yahaakale wona miyo ; vano kadda muthu ohukanna mvahi waaye-waaye omvahile Mulugu ; mmohi mvahi waaye , mmohiwa mvahi waayeene .
Musayelege odhivela , teto mwiilibihedhe wi mukanne mvahi dha Muneba , tthabwa-tthabwa musayele mvahi woovuwiha mutheenga wa Mulugu .
Vowi Mulugu eere : « Muyiihini mukale waara » , oliyeene dimoneyile mmirimani mweehu wi ni waara wo naande onona nthithimiho na Mulugu nnooneya vakoveni va Yesu Kirixtu .
Mudhidhi olene ahifiya oEfeso muZhudewu mmohi eeriwa Apolo , mukadda Alixandiriya . Ola aali muthu ooyesa awogaga ni oonona Maleba .
Mwahaya buuyene teto Yesu wakweliiye okwibi wa migaano dha nluwa wi aweelihe athu oodheela mwa mwazi waaye-waaye .
We Titu , osuuzihege dhego dhedhi , waawaraalihaga , waasumululaga ni owodha waatewene , ohumwihiyaga muthu wi oonyemule .
Odhivela wa Mulugu ohooneyihiwa vaari va hiyo mowindala : Ahimuruma Mwaanaye mmohi baahi mwiilaboni wi nikalewo odheela mwa oliye .

« Babani , ginafuna wi ayene mugivahiliinyu ekale vamohi ni miyo vevo vinaakaligiimi . Ginafuna wi yoone nthithimiho naaga , ndde nagivahiliinyu mwaha wi mwahigidhivela ehinapaddusiwe elabo ela ya vati .
Onoonga ni orabuliha dhili mundila mwiwa ,
Vowi nihikanna Yesu , Mwaana a Mulugu , musogoleli a anamakutha owaakwaranya aatene , ole ovolowile ofiya odhulu , nihidde vooliba nroromelo nnawogiihu .
Oliye ohaakela nriiho ni nthithimiho ookumela wa Mulugu Babe , wewo wadheele nthithimiho nookwaranya , ndhu neeraga : « Ola di mwaanaga onamudhiveliimi , onagihagalaliha ! »
Oneerana dhaatedhene dhedhi bu Muneba mmohive oyene . Onamvaha kadda muthu mooligana munafuneliiwa .

Mungero a nennayi ahooba palaza yaaye . Yahipwesiwa epaddi ya neethaaru ya nduwa , ya mweeri ni ya ttendderi wi epaddi ya neethaaru ya waara weewa eribe teto wi epaddi ya neethaaru ya mutana ekale yooribeene , epaddi ya neethaaru ya mahiyu teto ekale yooribeene .
Vevale anamwinji yahimwihiddaga Soxteni , musogoleli a nyuba ya matugumano , omuddwadhaga waaddamela vampanddoni voothonga vevale ; mbwenye Galiyu kaapwathile dhowiireya nde .
Vevale aZhudewu ale yahixixaga wi emwihidde Yesu dila emohiwa , mbwenye oliye ahaathawaga .
Mwaha wa ela kannalamwisa . Naari omuthu weehu wowooneya ovuddaga , omuthu weehu wohooneya onovirisedhiwaga nlabo ni nlabo .

Vano Mariya ahithukulaga meya niituru na makura oonukwela a mutheengo wookwima , eneeriwa naarudu . Okuthulelaga manyalo a Yesu , waahuhuraga ni nthithi naaye . Mbamwa mwahidhaalaga onukwela wa makura ale .
Mwa nroromelo Abarahamu ahikala mwanaweendda elabo yoororomelihiwa , okalagahi oli elabo ya amarala ; akala mmusasani vamohi ni Ezaaki , Yakobo , aliba waakela dhoororomelihiwa dhimohive .
Amudhaaga , mugihadhihegeve . Mwawaang'anege ale eneedda mowinda teto ni nifwanafwaniho nnoovahiihuni .
Mwaakelanege sapo mmohi ni mukwaaye , mweeragana ndo muneewelela nlamulo na Kirixtu .
Moone wi muthu oneeriwa owogoowa ni Mulugu mwaha wa meerelo aaye , ohuli ororomelave waaye baahi .
Ki vano , nnawoge ddi ? Mwa Mulugu muhukala dhohogoowa ? Nivang'onong'ono !
Mwaakeleni pama muthu winna nroromelo noolodhowa , ehili ni efunelo yowi mukooddege moobuwelelo aaye .
Koddo ehambeeliwa odhulu , Migeli ni angero aaye ehitatamula nyowa yowoopiha , nyowa ele ni angero aaye yahiwana ni aliwa .
Mwatakaleliwa , kamuthege . Kamfiyedhege nduwa odhowa mugali ootakaleliweene .
Onowiirelani yabure kammuwelihedhe yabure , naari ooruwanani , moohiyaniha , mwaalobelelege aliwa mareeliho , vowi bumwahaya Mulugu wuwiithaneliiyeni wi mwaakele mareeliho a mvahi woohiyedhiwa .
Ole ogirumile , oli ni miyo , kagihiyile meenka , vowi mudhidhi dhaatedhene ginowiirana dhoomudhivela » .
Mowindo mwiisasanyedhe muwane ! Mmagele sintu na ebaribari mmwiinuni . Muware omurimani yowiithithihedhana yowaakwanela .

Ttendderi tanu ni biili dhooniliiwe mundadani naaga na moono wooja ni extanti tanu ni biili , dhinatapulela nda : Ttendderi tanu ni biili bi angero a gerezha tanu ni biili . Extanti tanu ni biili si gerezha tanu ni biili .

Mbwenye nnamoona Yesu , akitihiwe mudhidhi vang'ono waakwaranya angero , ohabihiwe nthithimiho ni nriiho mwaha wi ohoona goyi yookwa , mooligana ni opama wa Mulugu , Yesu anone okwa , aakwele athu aatene .
Mwaha wi Mulugu dinalaba mwa nyo , dinoovahani efunelo yoolaba , dinoovahani kopolo dhoolabana wona Mulugu munafuneliiye .
« Guhuwaaddelani dhego dhedhi wi ohagalala waaga okale mwa nyo wi ohagalala weenyu okale wowaakwanela .

Wa we Timoteyo , mwaana aaga-aaga munroromeloni . Di miyo Pawulo , murumiwi a Yesu Kirixtu , wona mwaathongele Mulugu , Mvulumusi eehu ni Yesu Kirixtu , oli ojejihedha weehu . Mulugu Baba ni Yesu Kirixtu Nabwiya eehu yuweeddiwele thagaraga , yuuvahe mahala ni murenddele mmurimani mwaawo .

Emodha-modhave teto ahiyana yiiwomihedhege ni mukalelo woothithimiheya mwa tthottho ni dhoowara dhoofwaneelela . Ehiiwomihedhege ni mathithi owiira waaluwa moowaatthabwiha , naari ni dhoowiiwomihedhana dha oro . Ehiiwomihedhege ni osanga , naari ni dhoowara dhookwima .
Vevale Yesu ahisasanyaga muwaxaxu wa mungoyi wambeela waakumihedha aatene ode , vamohi ni mabila ni ng'ombe dhiwa-dhene . Ahibidhulaga meeza oocenja korowa , omwadha korowa dheewa .
Dhiinova hiyo nili oopaddusiwa axa a Mulugu , oosasanyiwa mwaha wookala muumohini ni Yesu Kirixtu wi niiregena meerelo apama , meerelo Mulugu yaasasanyiliiye wi nawiiregena .
Akwaaga oodhivela , kamututuwe munddo woweeha onadha vaari va nyo wi wuweeheni , ehikale wona yego ehinoopadduwelegeni .
Kabeni nihagalale , nimuthabele , ni omvaha nthithimiho , mwaha wi ohufiya mudhidhi wa matelo a Nibila , namateliwa aaye ohiisasanyedha .
Mmuware kapaseti oli ovulumusiwa . Mwihiddeele supaadda na Muneba Woweela , eli madhu a Mulugu .
Agamoonile muthu oonihiwaga goyi , ahimuthiithihedhaga , odhana othongi , woompa mwEgubuddu .
Vano nyo , amudhaaga , muhugome wiirana opama .
Muwaraale , mukale oolibeene munroromeloni mweehu , mweeddege muhoovaga , mukale ooliba .
Moohiyaniha , wathukula musasa wa Moloki , ni ttendderi , mulugu aawo Refani , vamohi ni dhoofwanafwaniha dhisasanyedhiiwe wi weebedhege ! Mowindo ginowuukwaranyihedha oBabilooniya › .
Mowindala , amudhaaga , kalani oolibeene , mulogolele mukalelo woweedda musuuzihiwiinyu ni hiyo , naari mwa madhu naari mwa kaarata yeehu .
Onisasanyedhele dhego dhedhi di Mulugu , oyene onivahile Muneba Woweela wona yoohiddeeliha wa dhedho dharoromelihiiye .
Ahiyana vosuuzihiwa ekalege oomaala ni murima wowiiyeviha .
Madhu oomwaaba mpogo a gerezha ohurumeedhege , vaahikala anamoona abiili naari araaru .
Mulojelane mmohi ni mukwaaye ni bezhu ya odhivelana wa eKirixtu . Gerezha dhaatedhene dha Kirixtu dha wuno dhinowuulojelani .

Yahiikuthulela theya mmuruni mweewa , yuunddaga , ekubanyaga , ekuwaga : « Huwi ! Huwi nluwa nuulubale wewo waali aatene yanna mwanddeya dheewa yahireela odheela ni dhooreela dhaaye ! Vowi va wora emohi baahi nluwa nddo nihinoongeya .
Muubuwelelege odhivela wuulubale onanooniha Babiihu , ofiyedha wiithaniwaga ahima a Mulugu ; ebaribareene nili ahima a Mulugu . Athu a elabo ela kinnonile , vowi aliwa kayamunonile .
Nyo azombwe , mwawiiwelelege makolo . Mwaatene mukameelanege mowiiyeviha mmohi ni mukwaaye , mwaha wi « Mulugu onowawiinyuwela owiithukulela , mbwenye onaavaha mahala owiiyeviha » .

Nivang'onong'ono ! Mbwenye sowi athu enone wi Mulugu da ebaribari , naari athu aatene egali ooratha . Dhili wona Maleba munawogeliiwa , yiiraga : « Nyo Mulugu , munowooneyihiwa wi muli owogoowa mmadhuni mweenyu , mwaathongiwaga , munogonjiha » .
Odhiile wuno ni owodha ovahiwiiye ni apogo a anamakutha wi aamage athu aatene enooharani yuulobelelagani ! »

Wale wahikala anamavuhulela ooratha vaari va nlogo teto eneere okumelela vaari veenyu anamasuuziha ooratha . Amagaaddi ayo enoodha evolosihe mowiipiteya masuuziho oobwanyula , efiyedhe omukoodda mwiinya waavulumusile , nda dhineere waafiyedhiha orimeela mowaaguva aliweneene .
Mwahaya buuyene asogoleli a aZhudewu wathabweliiwa omusayela efunaga ompa . Yeeraga wi kanahariha nlamulo nnawoga dha sabuddu teto onowoga wi Mulugu di Babe , eeliganihaga ni Mulugu .
Miyo ginowuutamaalelani mwaha wi munoguubuwelela mwa dhaatedhene teto munohara mowaakwanela masuuziho ayene yuupelekeliimini .
Vevale Davidi awogaga dha Yesu , ahiira : ‹ Goomoonave Nabwiya vameentoni vaaga . Oliye oli omoononi waaga wooja , mwaha wowi gihithikeye .
Nyo odheela mwa madhu eegumi a Mulugu , muhubaliwa dila biili . Ndo kadhiireyile ni bewu yoomala , mbwenye mwa bewu egumi yamukala-kala .
Mowindo , musorihedhanege dhoothega dheenyu mmohi ni mukwaaye , mulobelelanege mmohi ni mukwaaye wi muyilihiwege . Nlobelo na muthu owogoowa tha kopolo dhuulubale , nnowiirana dhijinji .
« Ebaribareene , ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi onagiroromela , ohukanna egumi yoohumala .
Kaginoohiyeni wona anakwaadhuni . Ginoowelela wa nyo .
Vihikala mpurelo dhijinji ebaribareene okala muZhudewu . Vowambeela , yahiroromelihiwa madhu a Mulugu .
Adhaari , mwawiiwelelege anya eenyu a mwiilaboni mu . Mwaariihege , mwawiiwelelege ni murima waatene wona munamwiireliinyu Kirixtu .
Sowi we onavevusa owoma murima vajinji wa Mulugu , ohuthonga waaye , ovilela waaye ? Kunadidela wi owoma murima wa Mulugu funoothukulela omatthwaruwelo ?
Nihinona mwa ebaribari wi namuloba yego enaligana ni ofuna waaye , oliye ononiiwa .
Mulugu onanivaha ejejihedho adhaalihe mmirimani mweenyu ohagalala ni murenddele muwari mwa nroromelo neenyu ni oliye wi ojejihedha weenyu wunnuwegeve ni owodha wa Muneba Woweela .
Wewo Yesu wakomeliwigiiye wahikala mudda . Vano mmuddani mule mwahikala nsiye nixa , naali nihinalogohiwege muruthu .

Mowindo mwaneenyama ole ahihiddiwa , vamohi ni namavuhulela ooratha , ole eerihedha dhootikiniha vameentoni va mwaneenyama ole . Ni dhootikiniha nda ahaanyengetha ale yaakelile dhitoonyihedho dha mwaneenyama ole , yeebedhile engamuthu yaaye . Mwaneenyama ni namavuhulela , abiili ala yahivokedhiwa ameentweene munyaza ya munddo enapaha ni enxofere .

Moohiyaniha , wona munawogela madhu a Mulugu : « Akala mwiiddani aawo ohukalana dala , omvahe yooja . Akala ohukalana nthona , omvahe yoong'wa . Weera ndo , onamuugelela makala a munddo vamuru vaaye » .

Mwihiye wi madhu a Kirixtu ekaraateye pama mwa nyo . Mwaasuuzihegeve , muwaraalihanegeve mmohi ni mukwaaye ni tthottho , mwiibagave ni efunelo mmirimani mweenyu masaalimu , jibo dhoomutamaala Mulugu .
Nyo amamuna , mwaadhivelege ahiyaniinyu , muhaanyanyuwelege .
Mwihiyana muKirixtu akanna anaamudhi amaamukwele aakamihedhege oliye , dhoorusa nda ahinyemelihe gerezha . Mowinda gerezha eneerege waanda waakamihedha amaamukwele oohukanna owaakamihedha .
Onamoonaya buula : Mulugu ohunivaha egumi yoohumala , vano egumi eyo eli mwa Mwaanaye .
Ole winna Mwaanaye ohukanna egumi , ole ohinna Mwaana a Mulugu kanna egumi .
Eera akala Mwaana onootapuleni , munoodha mukale ootapuwa-mutapuwelo .

Mwaha wa dhaatedhene dhedho dhuwaaddeliimini dha yoomaruwela ya Mulugu , ginowuulobani wi muhukukumuwe mwaha woorabula waaga mukaambura . Gili va mwaha wowuulaleyelani . Moohiyaniha , mukale owiithukula .
vowi athu owindo kinamwiimelela Kirixtu , Nabwiya eehu , mbwenye eneemelela dhigulu dheewa baahi . Ni madhu ooriya ni ootamaala enonyengetha mirima dha athu oohunonelamo .
Aliwa ehidhaaliwa ni dhohogoowa dha misawo dhaatedhene , obure , nrima , dhootakala . Ehidhaaliwa nihidda , opanana , owana , oratha wiiddana , onanlalave ,
Odheela owodha wa Muneba Woweela oli mwa hiyo , okameele yoologolela yapama eroromelihiwiiwe .

Ole onadhala dhowiira dhabure mooligana ni omuthu waaye , odheela omuthu oyo onoodha ahadde obwanyuwa ; mbwenye ole onadhala dhowiira dhapama , mooligana ni Muneba wa Mulugu , onoodha ahadde egumi yoohumala .
Kanimweehe Kirixtu wona amohiwa mwa aliwa mwamweeheliiwa , ndala yahikwa ni olumiwa nyowa .
Odhivela kunooniha obure , naari kunasayela dhaayeve , kunaaguva otakaleliwa , kunalogolela mwaha .
Dhahikalana dhowiithiithihedhana dha mugogo omurimani . Oruma wa mompelo eewa waali wona oruma wa magareeta a akavalo ajinji enathamagela okoddoni .
Gaheere gihidha , gaasuuziha , kayakanna muladdu wa dhoothega dheewa . Dhiinova kinna woothawela wa dhoothega dheewa .
Mweeddege ni tthottho vaari va ale ehili aKirixtu , mpuraga mudhidhi ni aliwa .
Nihinona wi omuthu weehu wawale ohukomeliwa vamuraddini vamohi ni Kirixtu wi omuthu weehu woothega ohukalena owodha wa hiyo wi nihiwelele okala adhaari a dhoothega .
Dhili dhoononeya ahima a Mulugu baavi , ahima a Ddiyabo baavi mwaha wi alene ehineerana dhowogoowa kahuwo ahima a Mulugu , teto ale ehinna odhivela ni addibila mwa Kirixtu kahuwo ahima a Mulugu .
Moobuwelelo a omuthu omwiiddani ni Mulugu , mwaha wi kineehela vati va Malamulo aaye . Owoga mwa ebaribari , kinaakwaniha .
Fivevo murima waaga onohagalala , nlumi naaga nnothaba ; mwiili waaga teto oneere ovuma moojejiha ,
Eehi . Ginafuna giwoge wi dhego dhinakuthiisu , enakuthela mineba dhabure , kinamukuthela Mulugu ; vano miyo kaginafuna wi mutaganyihedhane ni mineba dhabure .

Mu gerezha ya oAntiyokiya mwahikala anamavuhulela ni anamasuuziha ala : Baranabe , Simiyawu eethaniwa Nizheri , Lusiyu a oSirene , Manayemi onnuwile vamohi ni Heroddi , namathonga a elabo ya oGalileya , ni Sawuli .
Kamurumeedhe onyengethiwa ni madhu eebeweene ehinakamihedha . Mwaha wa madhu owinda athu enoothega , Mulugu onowaatolosa ale ehinamwiiwelela .
Enofuneya wi aliwa ekale oomaalihiwa , vowi enonoonga emudhi yaatene , esuuzihaga dhego dhoohufwaneelela , yiiragana ndo eharagamo korowa .
Yesu ahimunonaga ole ampeleke , bumwahaya wawogeliiye , eera : « Kahuwo wi mwaatene muli apameene » .
Yesu ahiiraga : « Ebaribareene , ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi ole ohunavolowela vamulago va nikola na mabila , agwelela cinga epaddi emoheene , oyo mbava , namapa .
Eneedda mooholowa mwaha woohiya dila yapama , eharaga meeddelo a Balaamu , mwaana a Beyori , akalele nrima korowa dhaakeliiye mwaha wowiirihedha dhabure .
Vano athu oode , aZhudewu ni apogo eewa , egaxixile wawooniha goyi ni waapa ni mabwe Pawulo ni Baranabe ,

Yesu ahimukohaga dila ya neethaaru , wiira : « Simawu , mwaana a Zhuwawu , onogidhivela ? » Peduru ahukuuwaga mwaha wi Yesu ahimukohaga dila ya neethaaru , eeraga : « Onogidhivela ? » Peduru ahaakulaga , wiira : « Nabwiyani , nyo muhunona dhaatedhene . Muhunona wi ginowuudhivelani » . Yesu ahimwaaddelaga , wiira : « Waakameele mabila aaga .
Mbwenye kamudha mvolowa yego yootakala , naari aliba owiirana obure ni owiirana dhooratha . Enavolowemo baalene elebiwe muniivuruni na Nibila , nili niivuru na egumi yoohumala .

Mwihiyana ole awarile dhoowara dha roxa ni dhoofiila , dhooriyihiwa ni oro , mabwe ookwima ni perola . Mmadani mwaaye ahikalana nakoma a oro adhaalile ni dhabure dhookwaranya ni dhootakala dha oraruwa waaye .
Vadhulu va dhaatedhene dhedhi mweenjedhedhevo odhivela onanigumaniha mookwaranya .
Yesu ahawaakulaga , wiira : « Ohufiya mudhidhi wi Mwaana a Muthu athithimihiwe .
We onawoga wi : « Kamuraruwege » , ki we onararuwela ddi ? We onatakaleliwa ni amilugu oosemiwa , ki we oneeyela ddi dha moweebedha mweewa ?
Mwaha wa nlamulo nddo , yoothega yahifwanya mpatha ovenyiha mwa miyo makalelo a osilila oohiyana-hiyana . Vowi vihili Malamulo , yoothega ehikwa .
Gineere wuuvulumusa wa athu aawo ni wa athu oode , wa ayene ginoorumiimi

Wale hiyo naali ataduwa ni oohiiwelela , needda moonyengethiwa , naali wona adhaari a dhidhivi-dhivi ni dhifunelo dhoohiyana-hiyana . Needda muubureni , a nrima , naali oweeddiha murima , nigananaga mmohi ni mukwaaye .
Vameentoni va Mulugu , vameentoni va Yesu Kirixtu ni vameentoni va angero aatene , guhuulamula wi oharege malamulo alena mowogoowa . Ohaakulelege mwaha ohiiwale pama , kawiirena yego moosakula .
Mwaha wa ela kamuthathile ebaribari yinniinyuna ; ndo nnoodhana yoothuva yuulubale .
Vano enakokomeziwa sowi oothikeliwa aatene ekalege oororomeleya .
Peduru ahikala oZhope wewule malabo majinji , vaade va Simawu , oyene asasanya makupa .
Nyo kamunonile wi muli nyuba ya Mulugu , kamunonile wi Muneba wa Mulugu onakala mwa nyo ?
Addibilaga , arogoraga , vowi nihikanna ebaribari yoovolowa Mburo Woweelesesa wa Mulugu odheela mwa mwazi wa Yesu ,
Yesu ahiwelelaga wawaaddela , wiira : « Miyo ginoodhowa . Munoodha mugisayelege , mbwenye munookwela mudhoothegani mweenyu . Onadhowiimi , kamunaande ofiyawo » .
Ndala nyo muli oosakuliwa ni Mulugu , oweela mirima , oodhivela a Mulugu . Mowindo mwiiwarihe ni thagaraga , oowoma mirima , oopwaasa , owaandaneyana , oovilela .
Ole onagiimelela enofuneya oliye agiharege ; wewo onaakaliimi , mwiimeleli aaga funaakaligiiye . Ole onagiimelela , Ababa enoodha emuriihe » .
Akale oonona weeddiha murala waaye pama ni waalela anaaye pama wi ekale owiiwelela ni anriiho ebaribareene .
Mowindo mutodolanege , mulibihanege mmohi ni mukwaaye wona muneereliinyu .
Mutheenga mwiiwiliinyu okuma omambeelelo buula : Hiyo nili mwa Kirixtu efwaneele nidhivelanege mmohi ni mukwaaye .
Ginoobuwela wi yaali yapama mwaha wa dhoorusa dha mudhidhi ola , muthu akale wona mukaleliiye .
Ahikalawo muthu mmohi a nikuru nuulubale na aFarizi , ndina naaye eeriwa Nikodemu , musogoleli a aZhudewu .
Mwa mukalelo mmohive , kahuwo teto mwa meerelo jeberuwe Rahabi adhe eeriwege owogoowa ni Mulugu , vowawaakela aliba weeddelela a Ezarayeli vano aakamihedha wi evire dila emohi ?
Mowindala mwihiyana onoodha avulumusiwe mowaabala ahima , akalave munroromeloni , moodhivela , akalave moweela ni moofwaneelela .
Mulugu a nlogo ndda na aEzarayeli ahaasakula abaabi eehu , wiinjiviha nlogo neehu egali anaweendda elabo ya wEgubuddu . Oliye ahaavenyihawo abaabi eehu ni owodha waaye wuulubale .
Oliye ononile mirima dha athu ohooniha wi onowaarumeedha athu oode , vowi ohaavaha Muneba Woweela aliwa wona teto hiyo mwanivaheliiye .
Mulugu wiire : « Kuraruwe » . Teto ohiira : « Kupe » . Naari we ohuraruwe mbwenye ompa muthu , ohusadduwa okala namapwesa Malamulo a Mulugu .
Ginowaavaha egumi yoohumala teto kidha erimeela . Kavili muthu onagaake mmadani mwaaga .
Dhiinoveva Mulugu onavaha murenddele onoodha ambwanyule Sathana vati va manyalo eenyu . Nabwiya eehu Yesu Kirixtu oovaheni mahala .
owiyooniha wi boomuroromela Mulugu , ekooddaga owodha waaye . Athu owindo , waarabelege .
Emodha-modhave hiyo nnaroromela naari nigalive ajinji nili mwiili mmohive mwa Kirixtu , kadda muthu doomagelelana ni amohi .
Madhu ala boororomeleya , vano ginafuna wi we Titu , waawaddihedhege moriihedha dhego dhedhi wi ale enamuroromela Mulugu yiipelekegeve mowiirana meerelo apama . Dhego nda sapama dhoopuriha .
Nda dhihiireya wona Maleba Ootaleleya munawogeliiwa , yiiraga : « Abarahamu oomuroromela Mulugu , mwahaya buuyene Mulugu amwiireliiye owogoowa » . Vano Abarahamu eethaniwa mukwaaye a Mulugu .
Addibilaga , arogoraga , nyo mwinna nroromelo mwa Nabwiya eehu oothithimiheya Yesu Kirixtu , kamukalegena nsakulo .
« Vamelo veewa masiye oohuvuheleliwa , ni malumi eewa enonyengetha , ndibwi na mare a evili nili mmilomoni mweewa » .
Mwa mukalelo mmohive amamuna yaadhivelege ahiyaniiwa wona munadhiveleliiwa mwiili dheewa . Oyene onamudhivela mwihiyanaaye , oneedhivela mwiinyeene .
Ki vevo niwoge ddi ? Niwoge wi ale yahaali aZhudewu , yahasayela wiiriwa owogoowa , yahaanda wiiriwa owogoowa voororomela .
Ekale athu a murima woohukanna yego yowaaruniha voologolela ebaribari ya nroromelo nenddo Mulugu naavuhuleliiye .

Ayene yinna anabwiya eewa aKirixtu , kayaavevusege vowoona wi oddibila ni orogora . Moohiyaniha , yawiimelelege mookwaranya , vowi aliwa enokamihedheya ni mabasa eewa , naaliweene teto bi aKirixtu oodhivela . Waasuuzihege ni waalaleyela dhego dhedhi .
Ki akala amohi mwa aliwa yaali oohuroromeleya , ohuroromeleya weewa onomaliha ororomeleya wa Mulugu ?
Mmohi mwa anyakoddo ale ahimulataga mbararuni mwaaye ni mwaalago , mowaaguva okumamo mwazi ni mahinje .
Nlamulo naaga thi nddi : Mudhivelanege mmohi ni mukwaaye wona miyo muudhiveleliimini .

Kamveleele yaano dha mwiili dheenyu wona yeela dha dhohogoowa , dhowiirana yoothega . Moohiyaniha , mwiiveleele wa Mulugu wona athu evenyihiwe muukwani , dhiinova eli agumi . Vano mveleele yaano dheenyu wa oliye wona yeela dha dhowogoowa .
Kanili ale enawelela mundduli , ebwanyuliwa , mbwenye nili ale enaroromela wi nivulumusiwe .

Mowindo athu aatene a Mulugu , athu ayo eneethaniwa « Ezarayeli » , enoodha evulumusiwe . Wona Maleba munawogeliiwa , yiiraga : « Onaakumele oZiyoni Namoobola . Onoodha avenyihevo ohumuriiha Mulugu waatewene wa anamabaliwelamo a Yakobo .
ayene empile Nabwiya Yesu ni anamavuhulela , vano teto yooniharahara , kinamudhiveliha Mulugu teto enowawiidda athu aatene .
Nakalela ntidi othega yapudha nigamalile waakela ononelamo wa ebaribari , ndala kuliwo mukutho mmohi onaanda othimiha dhoothega dheehu .
Vowi nili vamohi ni Kirixtu , Mulugu ohunivenyiha muukwani mwaha wa Kirixtu , onikaraatiha ni Yesu Kirixtu mmamburoni a mudhulu-dhulu wi nilamulege ni oliye .
Mowindo , kamuwelele owogaga dhooratha . Muwogege dha ebaribari ni addibilinyu mwa nroromelo . Mwaha wi nili dhipaddi dha mwiili mmohive .
Naari mudhidhi vang'ono kanarumeedhile dhoofuna dheewa wi ebaribari ya Muselu Wapama elogele mwa nyo .
Mowindo onawoga ewogelo emohi , alobele wi aande otapulela enawogiiye .
Sawuli , owawoopopihave anamasuuza a Nabwiya , ofunaga waapa . Ahidhowaga wa musogoleli a anamakutha ,
« Dhiinova ginadha wa nyo . Ginawoga dhedhi viliimi vati vano wi ekalena ohagalala wowaakwanela winniimina .
Moohiyaniha , muhagalalege vowi muli mu dhoovoreya dhimohive ni Kirixtu wi mudhaaleliwe othaba ni ohagalala nooneyihiwa nthithimiho naaye .
Ngasugwesese muwari mwa guwo ele , gahawoonaga aneenyama a meddo minnayi , owoopiha , owiiburula ni balame dha mukokolani .
Mbwenye dhiinova mwihiye dhego dhaatedhene dhedhi : Onyanyuwa , otakaleliwa , obure , oruwana , owoga dhoonyemula .
mwaha wowi mabasa aaye yaali mamohive , ookala ni aliwa wewule olabaga . Mabasa eewa yaali oosona misasa dha mooya a mbuzi .
Mwaha wa ela kamurumeedhe yoothega elamulaga mwiili dheenyu dhili dhookwa wi mwiiwelelege dhikwaminigwa dhiwa .
Wa athu ala nahaalamulela , waaloba mwa ntidi mwa Nabwiya eehu Yesu Kirixtu wi elabege mofwaasa ejege yooja yeeweene .
« Vano makolo eehu ale yahimuguliha Zhuuze wEgubuddu , mwaha wa nrima , mbwenye Mulugu aali ni oliye .
Mmohi mwa aliwa , ndina naaye eeriwa Agabu . Ahiwogaga ni owodha wa Muneba wi voohulogela weere odha dala yuulubale elabo yaatene . ( Dala eyo yahidha mudhidhi wa Kalawudiyu . )
Pawulo agawogile dhego nda , ahikokoraga ni aatene ayene , olobela .
Ale eli a Yesu Kirixtu ehikomela omuthu weewa vamohi dhoofuna ni dhikwaminigwa dha omuthu weewa .
Addibilaga , arogoraga , mukalegeve oohagalala mwaafwanyiwaga dhooharahariwa naari dhooweeha dhoohiyana-hiyana ,
Neera wi nihikanna omohi ni oliye teto needdaga muyiihini , nnooratha , kanneerana ebaribari .
Ahoonaga odhulu ogafuguwe , ekitaga yego wona guwo yuulubale , ekitihedhiwaga vati ni mapiyo mannayi .
( Yaali aPariti , aMediya , aElemi ni ookala oMesopotamiya , oZhudeya ni oKapadosiya , oPonto , oAziya ,
Ginomuloba wi nyo mwaandege weedda ni mukalelo wofwaneelela mwa Nabwiya , mmudhivelihaga oliye mwa dhaatedhene , mwiiragana mukalelo dhaatedhene dha meerelo apama , munnuwaga moomunona Mulugu .
We Timoteyo , mwaanaga , ginowuulamulela nda mooligana ni dhedho anamavuhulela dhawogiliiwa wale dha we . Madhu ayene yuukamihedhe owana koddo yapama ,
Dhigavirile nda gahiiwaga odhulu oruma wona ndhu nootaama na athu ajinji nikuwaga , niiraga : « Aleluya ! Ovulumusa , nthithimiho ni owodha saaye , Mulugu eehu ,
Nyo mwaali ookweene mminebani mwaha woohiiwelela weenyu ni dhoothega dheenyu dheeddeliinyu .
Kadhinafwaneelela wi nyo mmung'we nakoma a Nabwiya teto mmung'we nakoma a mineba dhabure . Kamutaganyihedhane va yooja ya Nabwiya ni mathanga a mineba dhabure .
Kamwiiregena dhego dhabure wi athu yuuwogegeni yiiraga muli anamararuwa . Kamwiiregena dhego dhookaliha manyazo . Naari kamukalege a nrima . Dhego nda kadhaafwaneelele athu oweela mirima a Mulugu .
Wa athu apama , dhaatedhene sapama . Mbwenye wa athu abure , ehinaroromela , kavili yapama . Owodha weewa woodidela yapama ni yabure ohubwanyuliwa .

Aatene yeewaga yootikina , yookohana , yiiraga : « Ola kahuwo olene afunesa wanoonga ale yamuhara ni omweebedha Yesu a oZheruzalemi ? Kadheele waahidda athu owinda aadhowegena oomagiweene wa apogo a anamakutha ? »

Dhiinova mabasa ethomeliwe Yesu bookwaranya ale enaahidda anamakutha amohiwa , vowi di namaandaniha a nipangano no waandana nixa nili nookwaranya , vowi ndda nimageyile ni dhoororomeliha dhookwaranya .
Mwaha wa okalawo waaga fumuriiha Kirixtu , gakwa onakala oreela .
Ginororomela wi Mulugu wambeele mabasa apama mwa nyo , oneere waakwaneliha Yesu Kirixtu aawelaga .

Teto nihinona wi Mwaana a Mulugu ohudha , ohunivaha wiiwelelamo wi nimunone ole oli a ebaribari . Vano hiyo nili mwa ole oli a ebaribari , nili mwa Mwaanaye Yesu Kirixtu . Ola di Mulugu a ebaribari ni egumi yoohumala .
Mwiilibihedhege wi mukalege mmurenddeleni ni athu aatene , dhakala dhowaandeya .
Kabeni , nilibihedhe ororomela weehu nihaanganyedhaga dhedho dhinajejihiihu , vowi doororomeleya ole ororomelihe .
« Ginowuuhiyedhani murenddele . Murenddele waaga ginowuuvahani , kaginoovahani wona elabo munavaheliiwa . Mirima dheenyu kadhikathamiheye naari woova .
Mowindo nnoliba murima malabo maatene , nnonaga wi viliihu mmwiilini nili woolapela ni Nabwiya .
Ole oneewa madhu aaga , ahaalogolela , miyo kaginamuthonga . Vowi kagidheele wi gaathonge athu , mbwenye gidheele wi gaavulumuse .
Nihikale wona Kayini , aali a Nambure , vano ampa ddibile . Ampele mwaha wa ddi ? Ampele mwaha wi dhowiira dha Kayini dhaali dhootakala , mbwenye dha ddibile Abeli dhaali dhowogoowa .
Dhiliga dhaatedhene dhahithawa , mwaango dhahirimeela .
Ndala mwa mulobwana mmohi , aali wona ookwa , mwahikuma anamabaliwelamo ajinji wona ttendderi , anamabaliwelamo ooheelengeya wona miseenga dha munyaza .
Wa Mwene amalabweene , oohukwa , oohooneya , oyene oliye yeeka dili Mulugu , okale nriiho ni nthithimiho okala ni okala . Ameni .

Oliye ahiwogaga ni ndhu nootaama eeraga : « Mmoove Mulugu ni omuthithimiha oliye , vowi ohufiya mudhidhi wa othongi waaye . Mmweebedhe ole osasanyile odhulu ni vati ni nyaza ni aneedduuddu a mahinje » .
Malabo alene anamasuuza yeenjedhedheyaga , aZhudewu yawoga eGerego yowawaaba aZhudewu yawoga eHeberi , vowi amaamukwele eewa kayapwathiwa vamagawelo dhooja .
Ebaribareene nyo mwiithaneliwe dhedhi , vowi teto Kirixtu wooniheliwe goyi nyeene , ohuuhiyedhani nifwanafwaniho wi muharege manyalo aaye .
Nikalaga ni nyo , hiyo nahuulamulelani dhowi : « Akalavo muthu ohunalaba teto kajege » .
« Mulugu ahidhivela vajinji elabo ela ya vati , ofiyedha ompeleka Mwaanaye mmohive wi aatene enaamuroromele ehirimeele , mbwenye ekalena egumi yoohumala .
Mbwenye muneba wabure wahawaakulaga , wiira : « Miyo gihimunona Yesu teto gihimunona Pawulo , mbwenye nyo kaguunonileni ; muli aani ? »
Gahimoonaga mwaneenyama owoopiha ole ni mamwene maatene a mwiilaboni ni anyakoddo eewa egatugumane wi ewane koddo ni ole akaraatile vakavaloni ni anyakoddo aaye .
Nahigwelaga mmwanddeyani wa oAdaramatinu , wafunaga ovira seresere ya oAziya , nahimaruwaga , oveleeliwa ni Arixtariku , mMasedoniya a murudda wa oTesalonika .
Mwawuubuwelelege eli mukaambura wona muli mukaambura vamohi ni aliwa ale enoonihiwa goyi wona di nyo onoonihiwa goyi .
Dhaatedhene dhineeriinyuna , dhinawogiinyu , mwiiregena mu ndina na Nabwiya Yesu , mmutthettheelaga Mulugu Baabi odheela mwa Mwaanaye .
Muthu onasuuza madhu a Kirixtu agawanege dhego dhaaye dhapama dhaatedhene ni ole onamusuuziha .
Kaavahiwe elabo , naari mburo wowaakwana nnyalo , mbwenye ahimuroromeliha omvaha elabo ela wi ekale yaaye ni ya anamabaliwelamo aaye , naari ahannave mwaana .
Mwene ole oonyengetha nlogo neehu , wawoonihaga goyi makolo eehu , owaawaddihedha waathathila aniiwa a manyenya wi ekwege .
Vevale Peduru ni namasuuza mmohi ole yahikumaga , odhowaga onsiyeni wule .
Mwaha wa dhedho ginowiilibihedha mudhidhi dhaatedhene weedda ni murima woweela vameentoni va Mulugu ni athu .
Eli wona kuluzi yowuuba ya munyaza , enakuthulela ode nipweru nookaliha manyazo eewa ; enaligana ni ttendderi dhooholowa , ala Mulugu ohaalogolelela mburo wooddiiha wiipipini .
Kagaakelile odheela wa muthu bure , naari kagisuuzihiwe , mbwenye gaakelile odheela moovuhuleliwa ni Yesu Kirixtu .
Vowi valamuliwiihu ni omuthu weehu , dhikwaminigwa dhoothegiha , dhedho Malamulo dhatatamuliiwa , dhalaba mwa hiyo , mowindo noovaha dhoovaha dhanithukulela okwa .
Mwa ela ohugisakula wi gikale namalaleya aaye teto murumiwi , owasuuziha athu a malogo mamohi madhu a nroromelo ni ebaribari . Kaginooratha , eehi , ginawoga ebaribari .
Ole oneewelela Malamulo a Mulugu onakalave mwa oliye teto Mulugu onakaleve mwa muthu olene . Nihinona wi Mulugu onakalave mwa hiyo odheela Muneba Woweela Mulugu onivahililiiye .
Ahikalevo ooxixa okala nakubela vaaye , kadda muthu azuzumelege dha opama wa amohi .
Mwiiwananege pama teto kamwiithukulelege , mbwenye mwaandanege ni athu bure . Kamwiyiirege wona atthottho .
Mwihiye dhaatedhene nda : moobuwelo owaawa , owali , otakaleliwa , okangana , oruwana , dhootakala dhaatedhene .
Gihisadduwa okala mwiimeleli a gerezha odheela moothomiwa ni Mulugu , ohugivaha mabasa owusuuzihani mowaakwana madhu aaye ,
Muru waaye ni mathithiya yaali oweela wona nthoje , naari oweela wona efunga . Meento aaye yaali wona malumi a munddo .
Vowi dhaatedhene dhedho sa opama weenyu wi mahala a Mulugu eneenjedhedheya wa athu ajinji edhiihe otthettheela woweenjedhedheya wa nthithimiho na Mulugu .
Muthu oli aatene onaje mwiili waaga , ang'wa mwazi waaga , onakala mwa miyo teto ginakala mwa oliye .
Oliye ahimwaakulaga , wiira : « Ee , Nabwiya , goororomela , ginororomelave wi nyo muli Kirixtu aroromelihiwe , Mwaana a Mulugu , oyene aadhe mwiilaboni ya vati » .
Athu ale yoodidela dhedho arumiwi dhasuuzihiiwa , yoodidela waandana , yoogwaddanya mukaathe vamohi , ni olobela vamohi .
Munodhiveliwa wogoowa , munowiiddana ni dhootakala ; mwaha wa ela Mulugu , Mulugu aawo , ohuukuthulela makura oohagalala , ohuusakula vaari va akwaawo » .
Ahimpiha ni supaadda Tiyago , ddibila a Zhuwawu .
Orabelege dhoothapanya dhinakoodda Muselu Wapama wa ebaribari teto orabelege dhoothapanya dhoohukalana mpurelo . Vowi dhoothapanya ndo dhinowaathukulela athu othegagave .
Aatene ale enawiidda addibila mwa Kirixtu , aliwa mapanga . Muhunona wi kavili nipanga ninna egumi yoohumala .

Aliwa egamalile oja , Yesu ahimukohaga Simawu Peduru , wiira : « Simawu , mwaana a Zhuwawu , onogidhivela okwaranya ala munagidhiveleliiwa ? » Oliye ahaakulaga , wiira : « Ee , Nabwiya , muhunona wi ginowuudhivelani » . Yesu ahimwaaddelaga , wiira : « Waakameele mabila aaga » .
Mwa Muneba muthu mmohi onovahiwa madhu a tthottho ; mwa Muneba mmohive , muthu mmohiwa onovahiwa madhu oononelamo ;
Olenddo wa nabiili , Zhuuze ahiinoniha wa addibile . Vano nihimo na Zhuuze nahinoniwa wa Farawo .
Sowi Maleba Ootaleleya ehiwoga , yiiraga : « Ole onafuna odhivela egumi yaaye ni okalana malabo a murenddele , ahiye owoga dhabure naari ahirathege ;

Nikuru naatenene na oororomela naali na murima mmohive ni moobuwelelo mamohive . Kaalivo muthu eera : « Nda dhinniimina saaga-saaga » , mbwenye kadda muthu ooveleela dhaaye wi dhikale dha athu aatene .
Vowambeela wa dhaatedhene , guupelekeleni dhedho wona teto dhaakeliliimi dhowi : Kirixtu okwele wi alivele dhoothega dheehu wona mulebeliwiiwa mMalebani Ootaleleya ,
Mwa nluwa ndde muhufwanyiwa mwazi wa anamavuhulela ni oweela mirima ni wa aatene yapiwe elabo ya vati » .
Athu oode veewiliiwa madhu ayo yahihagalala , yahambeela othithimiha madhu a Nabwiya . Aatene yasakuliwe wi ekanne egumi yahiroromela Muselu Wapama ola .
Ole oneerela onamoona dhego dhedhi wiire : « Ebaribareene ginoodha voohulogela » . Ameni . Mudhe , Nabwiya Yesu !
Mwiiregena dhisuuziliinyu , dhirumeedhiliinyu , dhiiwiliinyu , dhooniliinyu wa miyo . Mweeragana ndo Mulugu a murenddele onaakale ni nyo .
Mwa dhaatedhene kammoonege wona mwiiddani eenyu , mbwenye mmuxagihege wona ddibilinyu .
Pole-pole wi munaahiddiwe ni dhuubuwelelo dhoohukamihedha , dhooratha dhinadheela mwa dhoolemeelela dha emuthu naari dhinadheela mwa mineba dha elabo ya vati , dhihinadha mwa Kirixtu .
Ginathamagela wi gaande waakela yoothuviwa yoogonjiha . Yoothuviwa ela si egumi exa , eyene Mulugu egiithaneliiye odheela mwa Yesu Kirixtu .
Oliye ohiipeleka wa opama weehu wi anoobole mwa dhootakala dheehu dhaatedhene teto wi eelihe mulogo okale waaye-waaye , mulogo wowiipeleka wiirana meerelo apama .
« Ebaribareene , ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi muthu oneewa ndhu naaga , amuroromela ogirumile , ohukanna egumi yoohumala . Oliye kadha athongiwa , mbwenye ohuvira muukwani ohuvolowa mwiigumini .
Mungero ole awoga ni miyo ahikalana mpimo wa oro wi apimena nluwa , milago ni cinga .
Aliwa enadhowa omabwanyuwelo , mulugu eewa si dhigulu dheewa . Aliwa enowiithukulelana dhego dhabure ohiya okanna manyazo , enoobuwela dhego dha elabo ela , baahi .
Ahikale muthu oothwaruwa dhiino-dhiino mugerezha , woova wi oneethukulelege ni omorela mmusapani mwa Sathana ni othongiwa wona mwemo Sathana mwathongeliwiiye .

Akwaaga oodhivela , gahikathamiheya vajinji voofuna wuulebelani odheela ovulumusiwa winniihuna muumohini , gihiiwaddihedha wuulebelani wi muwaraale ni owana koddo odheela nroromelo Mulugu naavahiliiye kuluwi mulogo waaye woweela .
Aliwa yaali ootakaleliwa mwaha wi arumiwi abiili ala yowaasuuziha athu ni olaleyela wi mwa Yesu muhukala ovenyihiwa muukwani .
Dhoothega dhaaye dhuhuugeliwa ofiya odhulu , vano Mulugu ohuubuwelela dha ogwalagwambi wa nluwa ndde .
Yesu ahidhowaga dila ya nabiili nluwa na oKana murudda wa oGalileya , wewo oliye waasadduligiiye mahinje ekala vinyu . Wahikala wewule nameeddiha dha mwene mwaanaye abulela oKafaranawu .
Mwiiveleelege moohugoma , mukalege oopaha mwa muneba , mmwiimelelege Nabwiya .
Naari nyo muhumoonileve , munomudhivela ; naari muhumoonileve dhiinova , munomuroromelave vano thabani ni ohagalala woothithimiheya , ohagalala woohuwogeya .
Nnonona wi hiyo nilive mwa oliye teto oliye mwa hiyo , mwaha wi Muneba waaye onivahiliiye oli mwa hiyo .
Vevale vahikalaga muno wodhaala ni vinyu oonyuunya . Anyakoddo ale yahibwinihaga nthoje mvinyuni mule , oseredha ommirini wa hisope , ofiyiha omulomoni waaye .
Baabi ohunivulumusa mwa omwene wa epipi , vano ohunitamihedha wuumweneni wa Mwaanaye oodhivela .
Addibilaga , arogoraga , ginowuukokomezani mwiyiing'anele ni athu enatatamula ogawanyeya ebarelaga masuuziho musuuziliinyu . Athu ayo mwaarabelege ,
Akalavo winna mvahi wowiimelela , eemelelege . Akalavo winna mvahi woosuuziha , asuuzihege .
Va nlabo nenddo kamudha mugiloba yego . Ebaribareene , ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi dhaatedhene munamulobigiinyu Baabi mwa ndina naaga oneerege wuuvahani .

Mabwe malubale a matibelelo a cinga na nluwa yahiwomihiwa ni mabwe ookwima a misawo-misawo . Nibwe nuulubale nowambeela nahiwomihiwa ni mabwe a zhaxipe , nibwe na nabiili nahiwomihiwa ni mabwe a safira , nibwe na neethaaru ni mabwe a kalisedoniya , nibwe na nennayi ni mabwe a ezhimiralida
Mowindo muthu ononile yoofuneya wiirana , ahiiragana , onoothega .
Vampanddoni vahikuma ndhu , niiraga : « Mmutamaalege Mulugu eehu , nyo amwiimeleli aaye mwaatene , nyo munamoova , ahima ni apogo » .
Vowi nnowiibuleela vinakaliihu mmusasani ola wa dhiinova , nrabulelaga owara nyuba yeehu exa ya odhulu ,
Kadda muthu apimege mabasa aaye . Ndo oneerege wiigayela yeeka , ahiiliganihaga ni amohi .
Akalawo mmohi onoobuwela wi kaneedda pama ni mweenddaaye , oona wi enamwali yaaye enokwaranya , afunaga dha omutela , eerena ndo , kahuwo yoothega .
Enoodha yuwiigaregeni mu nyuba dha matugumano . Ebaribari mudhidhi onoodha wi aatene enadhe yuupegeni enoobuwelege wi enamulaba Mulugu .
Gahoona yootikiniha emohiwa yuulubale odhulu , angero atanu ni abiili ni milili mitanu ni miinddi dhoogomihedha , ( dhili dhoogomihedha mwaha wowi ni nda owali wa Mulugu onowaakwanela ) .
Yesu ahimwaakulaga , wiira : « Akala giwogile mootakaliha , wiirele onamoona wa yootakala eyo . Mbwenye akala giwogile mwa ebaribari , onagiddwadhela ddi ? »

Vano we mukwaaga oororomeleya mmabasani , ginowuuloba wi waakamihedhege arogoriyo abiili . Vowi aliwa , vamohi ni Kelementi ni amohiwa ehilaba ni miyo evuwihaga Muselu Wapama . Mandina eewa maatene eli muNiivuruni na Egumi .
Vowi aliwa yahithathila mwazi wa oweela mirima ni anamavuhulela . Mowindo muhaavaha mwazi wi eng'we . Siyeene yaafwaneelele ! »
Eehi , nivang'onong'ono ! Hiyo nikwile wa yoothega , nikalegeve mudhoothegani ?
Vano mwaneenyama owoopiha ole aaliwo , peeno ohuliwo , di mwene a neetanu ni araaru , oli mmohi mwa mamwene matanu ni meenddi , onadhowa omabwanyuwelo .
Ki Maleba enawoga ddi ? Enawoga wi : « Omwiigare mwihiyana mudhaari oyo ni mwaanaye , vowi mwaana a mwihiyana mudhaari oyo kanaagawane mureelelo wa babe ni mwaana-mulobwana muneeti » .
Mbwenye ale oofuna oreela , enomorela moweehiwani , enomagiwa mmusapani wa dhoofuna dhijinji dhoolodhowa ni dhoonoonga . Dhifunelo ndo dhinowaabwiniha orimeela mowoopiha .
Vano manyaga kumi yawooniliiwe ni mwaneenyama ole eneere omwiidda namararuwa ole , emwaake dhaatedhene dhinniiyena , emwihiye madave , eneere oja nyama yaaye , yoohalaya ethumeye veeko .
Vano akalavo mmohi onamudhivela Mulugu , muthu oyo doononiwa ni Mulugu .

Ki vano , niirege avi ? Hiyo aZhudewu nnowaakwaranya athu a malogo mamohi mmoobuweloni a Mulugu ? Nivang'onong'ono ! Ginowogesa wi athu aatene , aZhudewu vamohi ni aGerego enolamuliwa ni owodha wa yoothega .
Mudhidhi olene yahimusasanya mulugu oosemiwa ooligana ni ng'ombe . Yahidheelana mikutho , yahithabela mabasa yasasanyiliiwa .

Athu amohiwa yahakwile ni milili ndo kayaatthwaruwile mwa mabasa a mmadani mweewa naari kayahiyile okokorela mineba dhabure ni milugu dhoosemiwa dha oro , parata , mukuwa , mabwe ni mithanko , milugu dhedho dhihineewa , dhihinoona , naari dhihineedda .
Mowindo , mwaha wi nihinona omoova Nabwiya , nnosayela waakwekwetha athu . Mulugu ohuninona mowaakwana teto ginojejiha wi nyo muginone mmirimani mweenyu .

Wale hiyo aatene teto needda makalelo ayene . Needda wona mwa mukalelo wa emuthu yeehu , niiragana dhafuna mwiili ni tthottho dheehu . Mowindala , naali athu a mwiili wona amohiwa , mwaha wa ela Mulugu akala ootakaleliwa ni hiyo .
Peduru aheenjedhedha owoga madhu mamohi a onamoona , waalibiha , eeraga : « Muthawe wi mwiivulumuse wa anamabaliwelamo ala ooholowa » .
Vowi akala munahara mukalelo oyene wa omuthu , munoodha mukwe ; mbwenye akala ni nikamihedho na Muneba Woweela munoopa meerelo eenyu ootakala , munoodha mukalena egumi .
Vowi Maleba yiire : « Aatene enamuroromela oliye , kidha ekalana manyazo » .
Vowambeela , odheela mwa Yesu Kirixtu ginomutthettheela Mulugu aaga mwaha wa nyo mwaatene , vowi elabo yaatene enowoga dha nroromelo neenyu .
Addibilihu , arogoriihu oodhiveliwa ni Mulugu , nihinona wi wuusakulileni wi mukale aaye
Yoofuneyesesa sowi mudhivelanege mookwaranya mmohi ni mukwaaye , mwaha wi odhivela onokuneela wiinjiva wa dhoothega .
Dhigeewananeliwe wi nidhowe wItaliya ni mwanddeya , Pawulo ni anyakaambura amohi yahipelekiwa mmadani mwa sinturiyawu , ndina naaye eeriwa Zhuliyu , a nikuru na anyakoddo neeriwa Aguxtu .

Yahiiba jibo ya Mozezi , mwiimeleli a Mulugu teto yahiiba jibo ya Nibila , yiiraga : « Nabwiya Mulugu Oowodha-wodha , dhuulubale ni dhootikiniha bi mabasa eenyu ! Kingi a dhilabo dhaatedhene , dila dheenyu dhili dhowogoowa ni dha ebaribari !
Mukale wona ahima a manyenya , mmurimani mweenyu murabulelege mukaka woweela wa muneba wi ni mukaka oyo munnuwege ofiyedha omavulumusiwelo ,

Nuwindo , gahiiwa ndhu odhulu niiraga : « Leba : Ooreelihiwa baale enakwa mwa Nabwiya dhiinoveva odhowa musogolo » . Muneba Woweela wiire : « Ee , aliwa eneere ovuma mwa mabasa eewa , vowi dhowiira dheewa dhineere waahara » .
Otamaala wa ebaribari woohukanna maganga vameentoni va Mulugu Baba , fu wula : Waakameela anakwaadhuni ni amaamukwele mmakathamihoni mweewa , wiyiinanela weeka wi ohiitakalihe ni athu a elabo ela .
Ginawoga ndo wi ahikalevo onoonyengetheni ni masuuziho enakalahi bapama .

Vano gahiiwa dhoopaddusiwa dhaatedhene dha odhulu , dha mwiilaboni , dha vati va theya , mu nyaza , dhaatedhene dhiliwo , dhowiiba , dhiiraga : « Wa ole okaraatile vampanddoni , teto wa Nibila nivahiwe mareeliho , nriiho , nthithimiho , owodha ofiyedha okala ni okala » .
Mungero a nabiili ahooba palaza yaaye . Yego yakalahi mwaango mulubale yazha ni munddo yahivokedhiwa mu nyaza . Epaddi ya neethaaru ya nyaza yahisadduwa mwazi .
egamvokedhe ode wa nluwa yahambeela omvonya ni mabwe . Anamoona yahihiyaga dhoowara dheewa mmadani mwa mulobwana mmohi , eeriwa Sawuli .
Teto yiire : « Nyo mwaatene muhuli aZhudewu , mmutamaalele Nabwiya , athu a malogo maatene emweebedhe » .
Dhaatedhene dhinadheela wa oliye , dhinokalawoove ni oliye teto dhinamukalelawo oliye . Wa oliye okale nthithimiho okala ni okala . Ameni !
Omenseloni wiwa Zhuwawu ahimoonaga Yesu adhaaga wa oliye , vevale ahiiraga : « Mmoone , ndde thi Nibila na Mulugu , nnavenyihavo dhoothega dha athu a mwiilaboni ya vati .
Mwa nroromelo jeberuwe Rahabi kaapiwe ni ale yaali oohiiwelela vowi ahawaakela anameeddelela ale oohiyooneyiha .
Mbava onadheela wiiya , opa ni obwanyula . Vano miyo gidheele waavaha egumi , egumiya yowaakwanela .
Mbwenye hiyo nili anamurala a odhulu , nnamujejiha Mvulumusi eehu a wewo , Nabwiya Yesu Kirixtu .
Mowindo mwaakelanege mmohi ni mukwaaye wona Kirixtu mowaakeleliiyeni wi Mulugu athithimihiwege .

Mudhowe ni aliwa , mweyeelihe vamohi , olive mutheengo wa weelihiwa weewa wi yaande ojema miru dheewa . Ndo aatene enoonona wi kahuwo ebaribari dhinawogiwa dha we , eneerege woona wi onowiiwelela Malamulo .
Teto di baabi a owiineliwa ehili oogwaddiwave mmwiilini baahi , mbwenye teto eneedda mundila mwa nroromelo needda babiihu Abarahamu ahineeneliwe .
Vevale yahaweehaga aabiileene , asakuliwe di Matiya ; oliye aheenjedhedhiwa wa arumiwi kumi ni mmohi .
« Ooreelihiwa baale dhabure dheewa dhileveleliwe , ayene dhoothega dheewa dhithimihiwe .
Anamoona ala si mithanko miinddi dha olivera ni extanti biili dha panti dhinakala vameentoni va Nabwiya a elabo .
Mwiikubanyedhege , moobe kutho , muundde . Oteya weenyu osadduwe okale kutho , ohagalala weenyu osadduwe okubanya .
Oodhivela aaga , kuhadhihege mweeddelo wabure mbwenye ohadhihege mweeddelo wapama . Aatene eneerana dhapama ba Mulugu , ole oneerana yabure kanamoonege Mulugu .

Wiineliwa waaye waali wona etoonyihedho yooniha wi Mulugu ahimwiira owogoowa mwaha wa nroromelo nanniyena ahineeneliwe . Mowindo Abarahamu di baabi a athu aatene enamuroromela Mulugu wi yiiriwege owogoowa naari egalive aluku .
Vowi muthu okwile ohutapuliwa mwa owodha wa yoothega .
Nnothukulave mmwiilini okwa wa Yesu wi egumi ya Yesu yooneyihiwe mmwiilini mweehu .
Vowi aatene enasayela dhili dheewa , dhihili dha Yesu Kirixtu .
Mwa nroromelo teto Saara ahabalave , agooluvale ahaakela kopolo dhowi abale , mwaha wowi ahirumeedhela wi ole amuroromelihe aali oororomeleya .
Yoofuna ya ole ogirumile siila : Gihimurimeelihevo naari mmohi mwa ayene egivahiliiye , mbwenye gidhe gaavenyihe muukwani va nlabo noomariha .
mbwenye wa hiyo oliwo Mulugu mmohi baahi , oli Baabi . Opaddusile dhego dhaatedhene , onamukaleliihuwo . Vano oliwo Nabwiya mmohi baahi , Yesu Kirixtu , onakaliha dhaatedhene teto ni hiyoya .

Dhiinova Timoteyo ohuwelawo oTesalonika wo , ohunaaddela muselu wapama onawoga dha ororomela ni odhivela winniinyuna . Oliye ohunaaddela wi nyo munonuubuwelelave ni odhivela munorabulela onoona wona hiyo teto munarabuleliihu wuwoonani .
Vano Makambuzi Mulubale adha , nyo munowaakela kara ya nthithimiho ehinahiya ozherimela .
Mwaha wookalana ojejiha wowi ndala , nneedda nihoovaga yego .

Aliwa moolemeelela enonyemula dhihinoniliisu , eli wona aneenyama a mukokolani ehinanonelamo , enabaliwela wi esayiwege epiwege ; athu ayo enogayela dhego dhihinoniliisu wona aneenyama ayo enoodha etolosiwe !
Yamuwogihaga ndo kawaali mwaha wowaakubanyedha oorabula , mbwenye mwaha wi oliye aali mbava . Oliye dalogolela nthumba na korowa , wiiyagamo .
Nihifiyedha onona ni ebaribari teto nnororomela mwa odhivela Mulugu winniiyena wa hiyo . Mulugu dili odhivela . Ole onakalave mwa odhivela , onakalave mwa Mulugu , vano Mulugu onakalave mwa oliye .
Vano ale yamwadheyele mwaha wooharahariwa wambeele ni opiwa wa Extevawu yahimwadheya ofiya oFinisiya , oXiperi ni oAntiyokiya yaalaleyelaga aZhudewuve Muselu Wapama .
Ebaribareene , omweebedha Mulugu onopuriha vajinji , akala muthu onohagalala ni dhedho dhinniiyena .
Mwaneenyama ole ohurumeedhihiwa wi awane koddo ni athu oweela mirima , aagonjihe . Ovahiwa owodha wi aalamulege mahimo maatene , malogo , athu a dhiwogelo ni dhilabo dhaatedhene .
Nyo mweeragana dhabure moonihiwaga goyi , mvilelaga munaakele ddi ? Mbwenye akala nyo munowiirana dhapama , moonihiwaga goyi mvilelaga , enakala yoothithimiheya vameentoni va Mulugu .

Mwaha wa ela , Kirixtu dili namaandaniha a nipangano no waandana nimohi nixa wi ale yeethaniwe ni Mulugu yaakele mareeliho a okala ni okala , ayene mwiinyeene yaaroromelihiiye . Nda dhinowaanda wiireya vowi wahooneya okwa waatapulile athu mwa dhoothega dheeriwana nilabaga nipangano no waandana nowambeela .
Vano niwoge ddi ? Nikalegeve mudhoothegani wi owoma murima wa Mulugu weenjedhedheyegeve ?
Kamuwogege dheebeweene , naari dha aneba , naari thalako dhootakala . Dhego nda kadhifwaneelele wa nyo . Moohiyaniha , mmutthettheelege Mulugu .

Gahisugwa , keeng'anani , kavalo anddoora ! Ndina na ole agwelilevo naali Okwa , vano Mburo wa Anookwa woomuhara vakukuuve . Yahivahiwa owodha epaddi ya nennayi ya elabo wi yaape ni supaadda , ni dala , ni mulili , ni aneenyama owoopiha .

Mwahaya buuyene wi yoororomeliha ya Mulugu enavahiwiiwa mwa nroromelo wi yoororomeliha eyo ekale mvahi wa mahala wi ekale yowaalibihana anamabaliwelamo aatene a Abarahamu , alene enahara Malamulo a Mozezi teto ale yinna nroromelo nanna Abarahamu . Oliye di baabi a hiyo aatene .
aliwa vagikohiliiwa , yoofuna ogitapula mwaha wi kayagifwanyilena muladdu wofwaneelela opiwa .
Mowindo osakula wa Mulugu kunadheela mwa dhoofuna dha muthu , naari dhinaxixiiye wiirana , mbwenye dhinadheela mwa ole winna thagaraga oli Mulugu .
Kaniraruwege wona amohiwa mwa aliwa mwararuweliiwa , vowiira nda yahikwa nlabo nimohive macikwi makumi meenddi ni macikwi maraaru ( 23.000 ) .

mbwenye ginowoona muwari mwaaga wi nihikalawo nlamulo nimohi nnawana ni nlamulo nnarumeedhiimi mmoobuweloni mwaaga , nlamulo nimohi nddo nnogiiriha okala mudhaari a nlamulo na yoothega enakala muwari mwaaga .

Mowindala ndoweni nikwaranye masuuziho owambeela a Kirixtu , naaguvele waakwanela munroromeloni , kaniwelele matibelelo a masuuziho owambeela ale : omuroromela Mulugu , otthwaruwa meerelo enaathukulela athu omakwelo ,
Ahikalevo onaamunyemule , moohiyaniha , mmukamihedhe muulenddoni mwaaye wi awelele wa miyo mwa murenddele ; miyo ni addibila amohi nnomujejiha .
Amudhaaga , onapuravo ddi muthu eera : « Gihikanna nroromelo » teto ahiiragana meerelo apama ? Nroromelo nddo nneere omvulumusa ?
Vevale athu amohi a oZheruzalemi yahiiraga : « Ki muthu onamusayeliiwa wi empe , kahuwo olena ?
Agawogile ndo , ahaakudheelelaga mwela , wiira : « Akelani Muneba Woweela .
AZhudewu voohunona wogoowa onadha wa Mulugu , esayelaga wogoowa weewa-weewa , kayaroromele wogoowa onadha wa Mulugu .
Ole onamuroromela Mwaana a Mulugu , ohukanna mwa oliye onamoona ole . Ohunamuroromela Mulugu onamwiira namaratha mwaha wi kanaroromela onamoona wa Mulugu onamwiireliiye Mwaanaye .
Ebaribareene , ebaribareene ginowuwaaddelani wi oyene onagiroromela , oliye oneerege wiirana dhedhi dhineeriimina . Teto oneere waanda wiirana okwaranya dhedhi mwaha wi miyo ginadhowa wa Baabi .
Adhaari yawiiwelelege anabwiya eewa-eewa . Esayelege waadhiveliha , ehikanganegena ,
Pole-pole wi ahikalevo mmohi onayeleele mahala a Mulugu ; akale wona musisi woowaawa onapwedheya , otatamulaga makathamiho , sowi onowaatakaliha athu ajinji .
Weenjedhedha , vevo akale muthu owi ni oodeene enomuriiha wi onanyemuliwege ni omorela mmusapani wa Sathana .
Mbwenye Kirixtu ononivaha mvahi wi nihiddegena mabasa aaye . Oliye damaruwele makalelo oogawa mvahi nda wi muthu oli aatene akalena .
Mungero a nabiili ahikuthulela pusulano naaye mu nyaza , mahinje osadduwa wona mwazi wa mwanookwa . Dheegumi dhaatedhene dhaali munyaza dhahikwa .
Muhawiiwelelege yakala vevo baahi wi yuutamaalegeni , mbwenye mwawiiwelelege wona munamwiiweleliinyu Kirixtu . Mwiiregena dhinafuna Mulugu ni murima waatene .
Mwa dhaatedhene , mwiiregena dhedho ni wiiyeviha , nriiho ni murima wapama wi ale enawoga obure wa nyo , mwaha wa meeddelo eenyu apama oomuroromela Kirixtu , ekalegena manyazo .
Ela teto soofuna ya aBaba wi muthu oli aatene onamusugwa Mwaana , amuroromela , akalena egumi yoohumala , vano miyo ginoodha gimvenyihe muukwani nlabo noomariha » .
Mowaaguva mungero a Nabwiya ahimutatamula oredda Heroddi , vowi kaamvahile nthithimiho Mulugu , mihago dhahimuja marubo okwa .
Nimuthithimihe Mulugu , Baba a Nabwiya eehu Yesu Kirixtu , Baba a thagaraga , Mulugu ootodola mwa dhaatedhene .
Athu amohi yahihiya dila ela , oharaga madhu eebeweene , ofiyedha oholowa .
Miyo kaginakanna manyazo ni Muselu Wapama , eehi , vowi si kopolo ya Mulugu enaavulumusa athu aatene enaroromela , wambeela aZhudewu , ofiyedha wa aGerego .
Vowi kalivo onaamage matibelelo mamohi , ohiya ale emagiwe , oli Yesu Kirixtu .
Mbwenye enowoga teto dha nyo : mamuna oli aatene amudhivelege mwihiyanaaye wona muneedhiveleliiye , mwihiyana oli aatene amuriihege mamune .
Naari mwaalive ookwa mwa dhoothega dheenyu , muganna mirima dhohiineliwa , naari ndo oliye ohuwiirani ookalawo vamohi ni oliye , anilevelelaga dhoothega dheehu dhaatedhene .
Ohunyemule mvahi wa mahala oli mwa weevo . Waakeliiwe odheela mmadhuni ooreelihiwa vowuuhela madada apogo .
Gahoonaga odhulu wuxa ni elabo exa . Vowi odhulu wowambeela ni elabo yowambeela dhahirimeela teto nyaza yaatene yahirimeela .
Malabo maatene muhagalalege .
Malabo ayene athu eneerege osayela okwa mbwenye kinaafwanyege . Eneerege ofuna okwa mbwenye okwa onoodha waathawege .
Hiyo akala nnorumeedha wi Yesu ahikwa , ohuvenyihiwa muukwani , nihikanna ebaribari wi Mulugu oneere waadhana ni Yesu ale ekwile emuroromelaga oliye .
Ole onasoriha wi Yesu di Mwaana a Mulugu , Mulugu onakalave mwa oliye , vano oliye onakalave mwa Mulugu .
Musuuzihiwe ayi : mwihiye makalelo awale yeeddeliinyu . Dhoofuna dheenyu dhootakala dhuhuunyengethani , dhihibwanyula dhigumi dheenyu .
Miyo gili mulago . Ole onavolowela wa miyo onoodha avulumuwe . Onoodha avolowe , akume , afwanye thongwe .
yahivonyiwa ni mabwe , waapadhanya vaari ni vaari , yahaapa ni masupaadda . Yoweedda moozeezeya egawarile makupa a mabila , a mbuzi , kayanna yego , yowoonihiwa goyi ni waazuzumiha .
Akala muhunona wi oliye dowogoowa , mukalena ebaribari wi aatene eneerana dhowogoowa ebaliwe mwa oliye .
Vowi eyo Nabwiya sinilamuleliiye : ‹ Miyo guhuuhela we wona waara vaari va malogo mamohi , wi othukulele ovulumusiwa ofiyedha omagomelo wa elabo » › .

Ohiya ndo nnokoodda dhikalelo dhoonyengetha , dhookaliha manyazo ; kannalabiha dhooratha , naari ogombiha madhu a Mulugu . Moohiyaniha , naalaleyaga ebaribari voweela , nnowooniha ororomeleya weehu wa athu aatene vameentoni va Mulugu .
Vano Yesu vavuwihiwiiye omoononi wooja wa Mulugu , ahaakela wa Ababe , Muneba Woweela waroromelihiwiiye , ahikuthulela dhedho dhinooniinyu , dhineewiinyu .
Muhuwarihiwa ni omuthu wuxa mvirisedhiwaga moononelamo wi mukale nladdaniho na Mpaddusi eenyu .
Yesu veewiligiiye dhedho , ahiiraga : « Oredda oyo kahuwo wookwana , mbwenye dhiireyile wi Mulugu athithimihiwe teto wi Mwaana a Mulugu athithimihiwe mwaha wa oredda oyo » .

Muselu Wapama ola onavuhulela wogoowa wa Mulugu . Wogoowa wula onaakeliwa mwa nroromelo , onakaraateyave munroromeloni baahi . Vowi Maleba yiire : « Muthu owogoowa onokalanaave egumi odheela mwa nroromelo » .
Oliye agakapathile muraddi waaye , ahikumagana muluwani odhowa omburoni oneethaniwa « mburo wa Egarigadhi » . ( Mu eZhudewu oneeriwa : « Gologotha » . )
Nihikalana mvahi dhoohiyana-hiyana mooligana munivahele Mulugu mwa owoma murima waaye . Akalavo winna mvahi woovuwiha mutheenga wa Mulugu , avuwihege mooligana ni nroromelo naaye .
Yeegumi yowambeela yooneya wona poddogoma , ya nabiili yooneya wona ng'ombe yapogo , ya neethaaru yahikanna kove ya muthu , yeegumi ya nennayi yooneya wona mpungu onavava .
Mowindo , pole-pole meeddelo eenyu . Kamweeddege wona ataduwa , mweeddege ni tthottho .
Kavili ohiyana vaari va aZhudewu ni aGerego , vowi Nabwiya mmohive oyene dili Nabwiya a athu aatene , onowaareeliha moofeewa madada aatene enamweebedha .
Vowi Kirixtu mwa oliye yeeka ohaakwaneliha Malamulo a Mozezi wi kadda muthu onamuroromela onowiiriwa owogoowa ni Mulugu .
Kamukathamiheyege yego , mbwenye mwa dhaatedhene mmulobegeve Mulugu ni omutthettheela , munoneyihe dhaatedhene dhinafuniinyu mwa malobelo .
Dhego nda dhinanisuuziha wi hiyo nihisililege dhabure wona mwasililele aliwa .
Ahifugula musiwo wa mmuliddini , mule mwahigwela mwiisi mujinji wona wa thukutha yuulubale . Nduwa ni ode waatewene wahiriba ni mwiisi wa mmuliddini mule .
Mwa mukalelo ola , ahikalewo muthu onaamuthegele mukwaaye , naari omunyengetha . Wona mwawogeliihu , nuhuuwaraalihani wi Nabwiya oneere wawooniha goyi alene eneerana dhedho .
Mowindo muthu akala mwa Kirixtu onakala yoopaddusiwa exa . Makalelo eehu awale ehivira , makalelo maxa ehifiya .
Vowi Baabi onomudhivela Mwaana , omoonihaga dhaatedhene dhedho oliye dhineeriiyena . Baabi onoodha amoonihe mabasa ookwaranya alena wi mudhe mutikine .
Ole eeya , ahiye wiiya ! Moohiyaniha , alabege mwa ebaribari ni madada aaye wi akalena yooja ya vanlaboni . Teto akalena yego yowaakamihedhana oorabula .
Ginowuuloba teto wi ogisasanyedhe suubi aaga , vowi ginojejiha wi Mulugu oneere waakula malobelo eenyu vano agihiye wi gidhe wa nyo .
Muhurumeedhege masuuziho oohiyana-hiyana , oohunoneya . Eli yapama wi mirima dheehu dhilibihiwe ni mahala a Mulugu , ehili ni magano a dhooja ayene ehinapuriha yego wa ale eneeddela magano ayo .
Amudhi eehu , vano ninowuulobani wi mwariihege ale enalaba vaari veenyu , yuusogolelagani mwa Nabwiya , yuusumululagani .
Ababiinya yawogelege ndo mwaha wi yawoovaga apogo a aZhudewu . Vowi aliwa yahipanganela wi akalawo muthu onaakulele wi Yesu dili Kirixtu aroromelihiwe , emwiigare mu nyuba ya matugumano .

Mwaha wi di hiyo naakelile wiineliwa wa ebaribari , ehili aliwa . Hiyo nnamweebedha Mulugu mwa Muneba , nnohagalala ni egumi yinniihuna muumohini ni Yesu Kirixtu , kannahela nroromelo neehu wa mithupo dha mwiili wona dhowiineliwa .
Nlamulo naaye thi ndda : Nroromele ndina na Mwaanaye Yesu Kirixtu teto nidhivelanege mmohi ni mukwaaye mwa Kirixtu wona munilamuleliiye .
Vevale gahimoona mwaneenyama owoopiha mmohi agwelelaga okuma vati va theya . Ahikalana manyaga meenddi wona mwaana nibila , awoga wona nyowa elubale .
Amudhaaga , mwihiye wuubuwelela wona ahima . Mwa dhabure , ee , mukale ahima ; mbwenye mwa mukalelo wowuubuwelela mukale ooliba munroromeloni .
Vaari va nyo ohukalavo mmohi onarabula ? Alobele . Ohukalavo oli oohagalala ? Eebe matamaalelo .
Mowindo « libihani mada eenyu oolodhowa ni maboddo eenyu oogurumela » .
Akala munomwiithana Mulugu , onaathonga athu moohusakula mooligana ni mabasa eewa , Baba eenyu , nyo mweeddege mmuriihaga Mulugu mukalege wona athu eli aleddo .
Enofuneya mvilelegeve , mwiiregena ofuna wa Mulugu , mwadidelave munowaakela dhiroromelihiwiinyu .
Ororomela fu ohaanganyedha dhedho dhinajejihiihu , orumeedha mwa ebaribari dhedho dhihinooniihu .
Mwaha wa ela , mu ndina na Nabwiya , ginowuukokomezani wi muheeddege wona athu abure ehimunonile Mulugu . Moobuwelelo eewa kinna mabasa .
Mowindo kammwihiye muthu wi ookoneni mwaha wa dhooja naari dhoong'wa naari wuukonani mwaha woohukalaga mmathangani mweewa wona a mweeri dhixa , naari a masabuddu .
Mwahaya buuyene aliwa ekaleliisu osogolo wa mpanddo wa Mulugu , emwiimelelaga mutana ni mahiyu mburo woweebedhiwa . Vano ole okaraatile vampanddoni oneerege waakameela .
Vevale Pawulo ahikitaga , omukonaantela , omukubaarela mulobwana ole , wiira : « Muhukubanye ! Ola ohukanna egumi » .
Mowindo ginovilelana dhaatedhene dhedhi mwaha wa athu oosakuliwa ni Mulugu wi aliwa teto yaakele ovulumusiwa oli mwa Yesu Kirixtu wi teto yaakele nthithimiho noohumala .
Mulojelane mmohi ni mukwaaye ni bezhu ya odhivelana wa eKirixtu . Murenddele wa nyoovo mwaatene muli mwa Kirixtu .
Mwiiveleelege wa mmohi ni mukwaaye , mooneyihaga wi munomuriiha Kirixtu .
Mbwenye nyoovo akwaaga oodhivela , muhunona dhedhi , mwiyiing'anele wi muhuthukuleliwe wuubureni wa ooholowa , murimeelihaga mukalelo weenyu wooliba .
Nyo ahiyana , mwawiiwelelegeve amamuninyu wona Nabwiya munafuneliiye .
Oodidela othega waasumululege vameentoni va aatene wi amohiwa teto yoovege .
Mowindo ndoweni nihiyeni okonana mmohi ni mukwaaye . Moohiyaniha , kadda muthu alibelele ohiirana yego yowaakwakwathusana aKirixtu amohi , naari waaholosa .
Mbwenye onoodha okale nthithimiho , nriiho ni murenddele wa aatene eneerana dhapama , vowambeela aZhudewu , vooharela aGerego .
